page.title: 14ROADS IN WITHYHAM/ST.JOHN
page.content: There are two{roads}starting from Lye Green; one goes in a southerly direction then goes southwest. The first road goes to St. John's. The old {Roman}road goes very near the s-westerly road. Names like Faggot Stack Corner indicate that the wooded areas were known for iron smelting in the past. The shape of the road often follows early farm{tracks,}being metalled and turned into tarmac. ome straightening out due to modern raod traffic is to be found but not much. Road traffic signs, cats eyes in the cenrre of the road and painted white lines help to keep traffic moving safely.
